channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- Micro Focus Enterprise Developer, Micro Focus Enterprise Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- Micro Focus Enterprise Developer, Micro Focus Enterprise Server

item.title: CVE-2018-12469|2024-09-16T19:46:30.802Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20enterprise%20developer%2C%20micro%20focus%20enterprise%20server
item.description: Incorrect handling of an invalid value for an HTTP request parameter by Directory Server (aka Enterprise Server Administration web UI) in Micro Focus Enterprise Developer and Enterprise Server 2.3 Update 2 and earlier, 3.0 before Patch Update 12, and 4.0 before Patch Update 2 causes a null pointer dereference (CWE-476) and subsequent denial of service due to process termination.

item.title: CVE-2017-7423|2024-09-16T17:23:07.673Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20enterprise%20developer%2C%20micro%20focus%20enterprise%20server
item.description: A Cross-Site Request Forgery (CWE-352) vulnerability in esfadmingui in Micro Focus Enterprise Developer and Enterprise Server 2.3, 2.3 Update 1 before Hotfix 8, and 2.3 Update 2 before Hotfix 9 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to forge requests, if this component is configured. This includes creating new privileged credentials, resulting in privilege elevation (CWE-275). Note esfadmingui is not enabled by default.
